channel.title: SSH Config on Amit Kumar
channel.description: Recent content in SSH Config on Amit Kumar

item.title: Managing multiple SSH Keys with Github & Gitlab
item.description: I have always stumbled on this problem of managing SSH keys for multiple Git based SCM (Gitlab, GitHub) including multiple GitHub accounts. If you’ve single account - adding the SSH keys on your github or gitlab is simple. I currently have the following accounts: Github 1 personal account 2 behind the firewall (corporate accounts) Gitlab 1 personal account 1 corporate account If ever face a problem like this, it is best to create a ssh-config file which aggregates all your SSH keys.
